text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Chile Chico | native_name = | native_name_lang = es | settlement_type = Town and Commune | image_skyline = Chile-Chico.png | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = Flag | image_shield = Escudo de Chile Chico.png | shield_alt = Coat of arms | image_map = Comuna de Chile Chico.svg | map_alt = Map of the Chile Chico commune in Aysén Region | map_caption = Map of the Chile Chico commune in Aysén Region | pushpin_map = Chile Aysén#Chile | pushpin_map_narrow = yes | pushpin_label_position = left | pushpin_map_alt = Location in Chile | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Chile | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = town | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Aysén | subdivision_type2 = Province | subdivision_name2 = General Carrera | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | seat_type = | seat = | government_footnotes = | government_type = Municipality | leader_title = Alcalde | leader_party = PPD | leader_name = Luperciano Muñoz González | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 5922.3 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 214 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 4444 | population_as_of = 2002 Census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_blank1_title = Urban | population_blank1 = 3042 | population_blank2_title = Rural | population_blank2 = 1402 | demographics_type1 = Sex | demographics1_footnotes = | demographics1_title1 = Men | demographics1_info1 = 2,378 | demographics1_title2 = Women | demographics1_info2 = 2,066 | timezone = CLT | utc_offset = -4 | timezone_DST = CLST | utc_offset_DST = -3 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = 56 + 67 | blank_name = Climate | blank_info = Csb | website = Municipality of Chile Chico | footnotes = }} Chile Chico (Spanish for Little Chile) is a town and commune in the Aysén Region, Chile. It is the capital of General Carrera Province. According to the 2002 census, 4,444 people lived there. == References == == Other websites == * Municipality of Chile Chico Category:Towns in South America Category:Settlements in Chile Category:Aysén Region
